question: I was diagnosed with Auto Immune Hepatitis in 1990, Iam now taking Prednisone 10mg and Mercaptopurine 150mg daily. I have also been recently diagnosed with diabetes II and taking Metformin 500mg twice daily.  My question is Iam a Vietnam Veteran and diabetes II is linked to Agent Orange, could my liver disease also be linked to Agent Orange?  I also have denegrative arthritis and on Celecoxib 100mg twice daily. Iam also taking meds for high blood pressure Propranolol 80mg and Lisinopril 20mg daily.  At times I feel as if Iam functioning in to worlds, past and present, I explained this to my PCM and I was put on Gabatrantin for seizures and I have a constant high pitched ringing in my ears that sometimes becomes so loud I have troubles sleeping...  Okay now you see my problem are all these meds taking its toll on me? And what Can I do?
title: Auto Immune
